document_data.mainbody:
Reinhar VI was a king of the Arkaiuns of Dambrath.
The man who would rule as Reinhar VI was the third son of King Reinhar IV. He had at least four sons.
Reinhar VI was born in the Year of the Spellfire, 610 DR. He took his brother Reinhar Vs throne and name upon the latters death in 647 DR. Reinhar VI died in 691 DR, passing the throne to his fourth son.
